47#ifndef __sockpp_can_socket_h
48#define __sockpp_can_socket_h
49
50#include <linux/can/raw.h>
51
52#include <vector>
53
54#include "sockpp/can_address.h"
55#include "sockpp/can_frame.h"
56#include "sockpp/raw_socket.h"
57
58namespace sockpp {
59
61
79class can_socket : public raw_socket
80{
82 using base = raw_socket;
83
84 // Non-copyable
85 can_socket(const can_socket&) = delete;
86 can_socket& operator=(const can_socket&) = delete;
87
92 result<> connect(const sock_address&) = delete;
93
94protected:
95 static result<socket_t> create_handle(int type, int protocol) {
96 return check_socket(socket_t(::socket(PROTOCOL_FAMILY, type, protocol)));
97 }
98
99public:
105 static const int PROTOCOL_FAMILY = AF_CAN;
106
108 static constexpr int COMM_TYPE = SOCK_RAW;
109
113 can_socket() noexcept {}
119 explicit can_socket(socket_t handle) noexcept : base(handle) {}
125 explicit can_socket(const can_address& addr) {
126 if (auto res = open(addr); !res)
127 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
128 }
134 explicit can_socket(const can_address& addr, error_code& ec) noexcept {
135 ec = open(addr).error();
136 }
141 can_socket(can_socket&& other) : base(std::move(other)) {}
147 can_socket& operator=(can_socket&& rhs) {
148 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
149 return *this;
150 }
156 result<> open(const can_address& addr) noexcept;
162 std::chrono::system_clock::time_point last_frame_time();
170 double last_frame_timestamp();
171
172 // ----- Filters -----
173
186 result<> set_filters(const can_filter* filters, size_t n) {
187 return set_option(SOL_CAN_RAW, CAN_RAW_FILTER, filters, socklen_t(n));
188 }
189
201 result<> set_filters(const std::vector<can_filter>& filters) {
202 return set_filters(filters.data(), filters.size());
203 }
204
205 // ----- I/O -----
206
214 result<size_t> send_to(const can_frame& frame, int flags, const can_address& addr) {
215 return base::send_to(&frame, sizeof(can_frame), flags, addr);
216 }
223 result<size_t> send_to(const can_frame& frame, const can_address& addr) {
224 return send_to(frame, 0, addr);
225 }
233 result<size_t> send(const can_frame& frame, int flags = 0) {
234 return base::send(&frame, sizeof(can_frame), flags);
235 }
244 result<size_t> recv_from(can_frame* frame, int flags, can_address* srcAddr = nullptr) {
245 return base::recv_from(frame, sizeof(frame), flags, srcAddr);
246 }
253 result<size_t> recv(can_frame* frame, int flags = 0) {
254 return base::recv(frame, sizeof(can_frame), flags);
255 }
256};
257
259} // namespace sockpp
260
261#endif // __sockpp_can_socket_h
